::Spears::

She looked at him and whispered,"I belong to master Prebon now."  It 
killed her to say that to him.  She had stoppped crying, but had a 
pained expression on her face.  She knew that she couldn't tell him 
anything, under direct orders from Prebon. But she still had hope, 
knowing that she had bargained with Prebon to keep Striker from 
getting a chip.  She loked at Striker, not wanting to turn away.
She tried to reach her hand through the hole in the door.  She 
whispered to him, "I love you.  I'm sorry."  was all the orders would 
allow her to say to him.  

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker turns his head as he hears a whisper, surprized to see 
Spears looking 
> at him through a hole in the door. His internal systems reported 
that his 
> shoulder blasters were almost reactivated. His jetpack, though, 
would take 
> slightly more time.
> 
> "What's going on?" he asks Spears, remembering the chip that was 
shot at her 
> before he went into stasis lock.
